Animated adventure sequel, with the voice of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger, Linda Larkin and John Rhys-Davies.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the new movie adaptation of the fairytale, starring Lily James, Richard Madden and Cate Blanchett.(n)

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star has taken on the form of a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen.(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: A London car dealer is persuaded by an old flame to rob a bank. The heist goes off without a hitch, leaving the crooks in possession of cash and jewels worth millions - as well as a safety deposit box containing top-secret information the government and security services are determined to keep buried. Fact-based crime thriller, starring Jason Statham and Saffron Burrows.

programme.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons
programme.desc: Two brothers living in New York's Chinatown in the 1980s rise quickly through the ranks of a local gang. When their organisation clashes with a rival, the siblings are targeted by a hard-bitten cop who is determined to clean up the streets. Crime drama, starring Ray Liotta, Justin Chon and Kevin Wu.

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.

programme.title: Captive
programme.desc: A fugitive fleeing from a police manhunt is desperate to see his newborn son. Needing a hiding place, he takes a recovering meth addict hostage in her own home. The pair make an unlikely connection as they bond over finding ways to cope with the challenges in their lives. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Mara and David Oyelowo.

programme.title: Enemy
programme.desc: A professor who has become bored with his routine life spots a man in a film who looks exactly like him. He becomes obsessed with finding out who the actor playing the role is, and develops an intense relationship with his double's pregnant wife. Thriller based on the novel by Jose Saramago, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Melanie Laurent and Isabella Rossellini.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: A reformed criminal's daughter is murdered, and he becomes convinced she was killed at the order of a Russian gangster he once stole from. He and his former partners in crime launch a campaign of violence against the mobster and his cronies, but his wife begins to fear for what his mission of vengeance will turn him into. Crime thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Danny Glover.

programme.title: After the Sunset
programme.desc: A veteran jewel thief seems to have it all, enjoying a relaxing retirement in a Caribbean paradise - but the lure of one last heist looks set to be his downfall as an old enemy plots to finally collar the crook. Comedy thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Woody Harrelson, Don Cheadle and Naomie Harris.

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A journalist is driven to the brink of suicide by a smear campaign after he attempts to expose the CIA's alleged involvement with Contra rebels in Nicaragua and the importing of cocaine into California. Fact-based drama set during the 1990s, starring Jeremy Renner, Rosemarie DeWitt and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: The Loft
programme.desc: Five successful married men rent an apartment where they can carry out their extra-marital affairs in secret. The arrangement works well until they find the corpse of a beautiful woman handcuffed to a bed - but which of them is the killer, and how will the grisly discovery affect their friendship? Thriller, with Karl Urban, James Marsden and Wentworth Miller.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A washed-up former hostage negotiator returns to regular police work, but later finds himself forced to draw on his old skills in a bid to save a crooked accountant's children, who have been taken prisoner in their own home by a gang of psychotic delinquents. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Ben Foster and Jonathan Tucker.

programme.title: Captive
programme.desc: A fugitive fleeing from a police manhunt is desperate to see his newborn son. Needing a hiding place, he takes a recovering meth addict hostage in her own home. The pair make an unlikely connection as they bond over finding ways to cope with the challenges in their lives. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Mara and David Oyelowo.

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: Trainee FBI agent Clarice Starling is sent to interview an imprisoned psychopath with a taste for eating his victims. The inmate offers to help catch a serial killer who is holding a politician's daughter hostage - but to learn what he knows, Clarice has to engage in his dangerous mind games. Jonathan Demme's Oscar-winning thriller, based on Thomas Harris's novel, starring Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn and Ted Levine.

programme.title: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A devoted husband is left at home alone when his family is away for the weekend. When two stranded women turn up on his doorstep, he invites them in and is tempted to take advantage of the opportunity - only to find himself drawn into a seductive and dangerous game of cat and mouse. Thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo and Ana de Armas.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Four city friends look forward to a weekend canoeing trip in America's Deep South. However, their adventure turns into a nightmare when menacing rednecks come down from the nearby hills and subject them to a shocking assault, forcing the men to take extreme action to save their lives. John Boorman's thriller based on James Dickey's novel, with Burt Reynolds, Jon Voight, Ronny Cox, Ned Beatty and Bill McKinney.(n)

programme.title: Straight Time
programme.desc: A jailbird resolves to turn over a new leaf, but is eventually dragged back into a life of crime by his former underworld associates. Drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Harry Dean Stanton, Theresa Russell, Gary Busey and Kathy Bates.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset.(n)

programme.title: Tracers
programme.desc: A New York bike messenger ends up heavily in debt to Chinese gangsters, and needs to make a lot of money quickly. Salvation arrives when he joins a gang of criminals, who use their parkour skills to pull off a series of seemingly impossible heists. Action adventure, starring Taylor Lautner and Marie Avgeropoulos.(n)

programme.title: Montana
programme.desc: A teenage criminal discovers that the gangster he works for secretly killed his father. He meets a former Serbian soldier whose wife and son were also murdered by the same man, and they join forces to get their revenge. Crime thriller, starring Lars Mikkelsen, McKell David, Michelle Fairley and Ashley Walters.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.(n)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset.(n)

programme.title: Tracers
programme.desc: A New York bike messenger ends up heavily in debt to Chinese gangsters, and needs to make a lot of money quickly. Salvation arrives when he joins a gang of criminals, who use their parkour skills to pull off a series of seemingly impossible heists. Action adventure, starring Taylor Lautner and Marie Avgeropoulos.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.(n)

programme.title: We Still Kill the Old Way
programme.desc: A former gangster returns to London after 30 years living in exile in Spain when he receives word of his brother's murder. Angered by the brutality of a new generation of criminals who have taken over his territory, he gets his old partners in crime back together to avenge his sibling and restore order to the streets. Gangster drama, starring Ian Ogilvy and Allison Doody.(n)

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A doctor's wife recovering from a car accident is troubled by terrifying visions of a ghostly girl who seems to be asking for help from beyond the grave. While her husband thinks the experiences are the result of her recent trauma, a psychiatrist urges her to communicate with the spirit. Supernatural thriller, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Harrison Ford, Diana Scarwid and Joe Morton.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A man searching for his missing sister heads for a disused campsite on the edge of a lake, where a horrific massacre took place years ago. At the same time, a group of students goes to the camp for a party, only to find a masked maniac lurking in the woods with murder in mind. Horror remake, starring Jared Padalecki, Danielle Panabaker, Amanda Righetti and Derek Mears.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: A scientist researching Alzheimer's disease devises a way to enlarge the brains of killer sharks on an isolated research facility to help develop her theories. However, the experiments result in a marked increase in the creatures' intelligence, and before long they manage to escape their confinement - with bloody consequences. Thriller, starring Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, Stellan Skarsgard, LL Cool J and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her husband has died in a car crash - but the next day he turns out to be alive and well. As the past and the future blur into one, she finds herself living the days before and after the tragedy in seemingly random order and tries to find a way to prevent the accident from happening. Supernatural thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: Babylon AD
programme.desc: A mercenary in a post-apocalyptic future accepts a job escorting a mysterious girl and the nun protecting her from Russia to New York. Along the way, she exhibits strange powers that could hold the key to mankind's salvation - but various factions are plotting to put her gifts to their own use. Sci-fi adventure, starring Vin Diesel, Michelle Yeoh, Melanie Thierry, Gerard Depardieu and Charlotte Rampling.

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: A scientist researching Alzheimer's disease devises a way to enlarge the brains of killer sharks on an isolated research facility to help develop her theories. However, the experiments result in a marked increase in the creatures' intelligence, and before long they manage to escape their confinement - with bloody consequences. Thriller, starring Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, Stellan Skarsgard, LL Cool J and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her husband has died in a car crash - but the next day he turns out to be alive and well. As the past and the future blur into one, she finds herself living the days before and after the tragedy in seemingly random order and tries to find a way to prevent the accident from happening. Supernatural thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and Julian McMahon.

Along the way, she exhibits strange powers that could hold the key to mankind's salvation - but various factions are plotting to put her gifts to their own use. Sci-fi adventure, starring Vin Diesel, Michelle Yeoh, Melanie Thierry, Gerard Depardieu and Charlotte Rampling.

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy, withdrawn teenager discovers she has paranormal powers, which she uses to protect herself from her abusive mother and classmates. When a friendly student invites her to the prom, she is determined to enjoy herself and is amazed when she is crowned queen of the ball - but joy turns to fury when her tormentors play a cruel prank. Brian De Palma's adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, with Sissy Spacek, Piper Laurie and Amy Irving.(n)

programme.title: Cujo
programme.desc: A family's amiable St Bernard is bitten by a rabid bat and, as the infection takes hold, the devoted dog is transformed into a vicious killer - eventually trapping a mother and her son in their car in the baking heat of an isolated junkyard. Horror based on Stephen King's novel, starring Dee Wallace Stone, Daniel Hugh-Kelly and Danny Pintauro.(n)

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.(n)

programme.title: 13 Sins
programme.desc: A salesman in financial difficulties receives a mysterious phone call telling him he is being filmed by hidden cameras, and will win millions of dollars if he can complete 13 bizarre tasks. He accepts the challenge, but finds the game soon takes a violent, twisted turn. Remake of Thai thriller 13: Game of Death, starring Mark Webber and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: The X Files
programme.desc: FBI special agents Mulder and Scully are reassigned from their paranormal investigations to deal with a terrorist attack on a government building. They discover the bombing is an attempt to cover up the existence of an alien virus that threatens all life on Earth. Sci-fi thriller based on the TV series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Martin Landau and Armin Mueller-Stahl.(n)

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: A gang of interplanetary smugglers is pursued by a government assassin searching for a teenage girl who has taken shelter on board their spaceship. Gifted with extraordinary telepathic powers, she has uncovered a secret that threatens the political stability of the universe - and the ruling forces will stop at nothing to ensure it stays buried. Sci-fi adventure based on the TV series Firefly, starring Nathan Fillion, Summer Glau and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron.(n)

programme.title: 13 Sins
programme.desc: A salesman in financial difficulties receives a mysterious phone call telling him he is being filmed by hidden cameras, and will win millions of dollars if he can complete 13 bizarre tasks. He accepts the challenge, but finds the game soon takes a violent, twisted turn. Remake of Thai thriller 13: Game of Death, starring Mark Webber and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.(n)

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: A gang of interplanetary smugglers is pursued by a government assassin searching for a teenage girl who has taken shelter on board their spaceship. Gifted with extraordinary telepathic powers, she has uncovered a secret that threatens the political stability of the universe - and the ruling forces will stop at nothing to ensure it stays buried. Sci-fi adventure based on the TV series Firefly, starring Nathan Fillion, Summer Glau and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron.(n)

programme.title: The X Files
programme.desc: FBI special agents Mulder and Scully are reassigned from their paranormal investigations to deal with a terrorist attack on a government building. They discover the bombing is an attempt to cover up the existence of an alien virus that threatens all life on Earth. Sci-fi thriller based on the TV series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Martin Landau and Armin Mueller-Stahl.(n)

programme.title: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
programme.desc: A hard-up reformed crook agrees to pay off his debts by doing one last job for his psychotic former boss. He reunites with a motley group of one-time criminals, but unfortunately they botch the assignment and a hitman is sent to finish them off. Thriller, starring Andy Garcia, Christopher Walken, Treat Williams, Gabrielle Anwar and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Play Misty for Me
programme.desc: A DJ has a one-night stand with an obsessive woman who repeatedly calls his station with the same song request. When he revives his relationship with an old flame, his unstable fan is driven mad with jealousy. Psychological thriller, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, with Jessica Walter, Donna Mills, John Larch and James McEachin.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: A shy, naive lawyer falls foul of a gunslinger while on his way to the backwoods town of Shinbone. His life is saved by a local woman, and he in turn devotes himself to helping the townsfolk while searching for a way to bring the bandit to justice. However, he finally comes to realise that a more aggressive approach will be needed. John Ford's Western, starring James Stewart, Lee Marvin, John Wayne, Woody Strode and Vera Miles.

programme.title: Hell Is for Heroes
programme.desc: A rebellious soldier defies orders to lead two men on a secret attack on a German pillbox, but his mission fails and the other two soldiers are killed. Court-martialled for his actions, he remains convinced his plan was sound and ignores the sentence to make a second attempt at destroying the emplacement. Second World War adventure, with Steve McQueen, James Coburn and Bobby Darin.

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is on the verge of retirement, but when he learns his former protege has been thrown into a Chinese prison and is awaiting execution, he decides to launch a perilous and ill-advised rescue attempt. Thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Robert Redford, Catherine McCormack and Stephen Dillane.

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A disgraced New York Times reporter discovers that an accused killer has assumed his identity, and the resulting investigation turns into a game of cat and mouse. Fact-based drama, starring Jonah Hill, James Franco and Felicity Jones.

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is on the verge of retirement, but when he learns his former protege has been thrown into a Chinese prison and is awaiting execution, he decides to launch a perilous and ill-advised rescue attempt. Thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Robert Redford, Catherine McCormack and Stephen Dillane.

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: The Burning
programme.desc: A mysterious man attempts to rescue a young woman who has been kidnapped by the mercenaries who murdered her father and took control of his farm. Argentinean Western drama, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Alice Braga and Claudio Tolcachir.(n)

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A college undergraduate training for a marathon is drawn into a shady world of espionage by his secret agent brother and a Nazi war criminal searching for a cache of stolen diamonds - entangling the student in a plot involving kidnap, torture and political intrigue. John Schlesinger's thriller, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. Based on the novel by William Goldman.(n)

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.(n)

programme.title: The Necessary Death of Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: A troubled American travels to Romania in the aftermath of his mother's death. He becomes obsessed with a cellist he meets who is concealing a violent past. His efforts to romance her could cost him his life following a run-in with her brutally violent husband. Drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Evan Rachel Wood and Mads Mikkelsen.(n)

programme.title: The Face of an Angel
programme.desc: A journalist and a documentary-maker become obsessed with the murder case they are covering. Fact-based drama inspired by Amanda Knox's case and the death of Meredith Kercher in 2007, starring Daniel Bruhl, Kate Beckinsale and Cara Delevingne.(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Boxer Rubin `Hurricane' Carter dreams of winning the middleweight world title, only to be wrongfully thrown into prison for the murders of three people in a bar. Nineteen years later, a teenager reads the fighter's autobiography and sets out on a campaign to free him. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, John Hannah, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber and Dan Hedaya.(n)

programme.title: How to Steal a Million
programme.desc: A woman hires a burglar to steal one of her grandfather's forged sculptures from a prestigious Paris museum before it can be exposed publicly as a fake, unaware the man is actually a detective investigating the family. However, the cop suffers a crisis of conscience when he finds himself falling for the woman. Crime comedy, starring Audrey Hepburn, Peter O'Toole, Charles Boyer, Eli Wallach and Hugh Griffith.(n)

programme.title: The Sea Inside
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a fisherman who is paralysed from the neck down in a diving accident. After spending years dependent on others to take care of him, he decides to fight for the legal right to end his own life. Starring Javier Bardem, Belen Rueda and Lola Duenas. In Spanish, Catalan and Galician.(n)

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A successful doctor is shocked to discover his wife once harboured feelings for another man and resolves to get even by embarking on an affair of his own - only to end up involved with a dangerous exclusive cult. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Sydney Pollack and Marie Richardson.(n)

programme.title: The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser
programme.desc: A man with no concept of social behaviour is abandoned in a town square after enduring a life of imprisonment. Caring locals teach the youth to talk, walk and write, but he struggles to overcome his feelings of being an outsider in their close-knit community. Werner Herzog's fact-based period drama, starring Bruno S, Walter Ladengast, Brigitte Mira and Michael Kroecher. In German.

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: The survivors of a torpedoed passenger ship are set adrift in a lifeboat. As they pull out other survivors from the sea, they realise one of them is the U-boat commander responsible for the disaster. Alfred Hitchcock's Second World War drama, starring Tallulah Bankhead, Walter Slezak, William Bendix, Hume Cronyn and Henry Hull.

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: An advertising executive tries to start a new life in California with his family and their lumbering, disaster-prone Great Dane. The friendly but clumsy dog accidentally causes chaos for his owners, until an incident at a surfing competition makes him a local celebrity. Comedy, with Lee Pace, and featuring the voice of Owen Wilson.

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: A self-help guru goes on a lecture tour after his wife's death, offering advice on how to cope with grief. However, when he falls in love he begins to realise he has yet to confront his own loss, while the object of his affection has a troubled past of her own to deal with. Romantic drama, starring Aaron Eckhart, Jennifer Aniston and Martin Sheen.

programme.title: Short Circuit 2
programme.desc: Manic mechanoid Johnny Five meets an old friend in New York City and embarks on a fact-finding tour - but ends up entangled in a series of escapades culminating in a bank robbery. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Fisher Stevens, Michael McKean, Cynthia Gibb and Jack Weston, with the voice of Tim Blaney.

programme.title: St Trinian's
programme.desc: An anarchic girls' boarding school is threatened with closure, owing to financial difficulties and a strict education minister determined to clean up its bad reputation. The pupils realise their hapless teachers are unable to deal with the crisis, so plan to save the day by dabbling in art theft. Comedy, starring Rupert Everett in a dual role alongside Colin Firth, Russell Brand and Gemma Arterton.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A rancher seizes the chance to settle his debts and earn his son's respect by agreeing to escort a notorious outlaw to the town of Contention, where a train will take the prisoner to jail. But the journey takes a dangerous turn when the criminal tries to manipulate the rancher into letting him go - while his henchmen lie in wait. Western remake, starring Russell Crowe, Christian Bale and Gretchen Mol.

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Laidback ladies man Mitch secretly envies best friend Dave's life as a husband and father, while Dave in turn longs for Mitch's lack of responsibility. During a drunken night out, they confess their desire to switch places - but when the wish is magically granted, they each find the other's routine is not as simple as it looks. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman and Ryan Reynolds.

programme.title: Heart of Glass
programme.desc: A village in Germany is famous for a unique form of glass, but when the manager of the glassworks dies, the secret to its creation is lost. His son desperately tries to rediscover the process, while the rest of the villagers descend into madness. Werner Herzog's period drama, made with the cast under hypnosis, starring Josef Bierbichler and Stefan Guttler. In German.(n)

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: A Chinese secret agent falls in love with a single mother while helping the CIA apprehend a terrorist, and decides to quit the espionage business. He offers to look after her three kids for the weekend, but struggles to cope with their mischief-making - and to make matters worse, the terrorist escapes from prison. Comedy, with Jackie Chan and Magnus Scheving.(n)

programme.title: Doctor in Distress
programme.desc: Amorous medic Simon Sparrow tries to sort out the romantic problems in his life - but has the added complication of playing Cupid for his pompous boss Sir Lancelot Spratt. Hospital comedy, with Dirk Bogarde making his last appearance in the role alongside James Robertson Justice, Samantha Eggar, Barbara Murray, Donald Houston and Mylene Demongeot.(n)

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into a forest that her scientist father believes is home to a race of miniature people. She stumbles on the tiny creatures and is shrunk down to their size so she can carry out a quest to save their new queen from an invading army. Animated adventure, with the voices of Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, Colin Farrell and Christoph Waltz.(n)

programme.title: New in Town
programme.desc: A Miami business executive accepts a temporary assignment helping to downsize a manufacturing plant in a small Minnesota town. Despite a frosty reception, she soon finds herself warming to the community and falling in love with the man of her dreams - until she is asked to do the unthinkable. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Harry Connick Jr and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: A couple whose daughter develops leukaemia have another child to eventually provide a donor organ for her sister. However, as the younger child enters her teens and learns why she was born, she rejects the arrangement and hires a lawyer to seek legal separation from her parents. Drama, starring Cameron Diaz, Abigail Breslin and Alec Baldwin.(n)

programme.title: Locke
programme.desc: A devoted family man preparing to face the biggest challenge of his career receives a mysterious phone call that leads him to make a fateful decision. However, this act sets in motion a series of events that threaten to destroy his entire life over the course of a single car journey. Thriller, starring Tom Hardy, with the voices of Olivia Colman and Andrew Scott.(n)

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: A criminal is released from prison with revenge in mind. His brother was murdered while he was behind bars. He hunts down the men responsible, pursued by a cop on the verge of retirement and a ruthless hitman. Action adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Billy Bob Thornton, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Carla Gugino.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Cindy is introduced to a self-help book on how to be the perfect wife, but when she follows the instructions found within she risks going into premature labour due to exhaustion.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A soldier in Jason's company explains what is happening to the Jews at the hands of the Nazis in Europe. Meanwhile, Elizabeth gets teased for being such a smart student at school.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: To save him from farmer Parson's shotgun, Laura adopts a mischievous billy goat and names him Fred. However, she finds the creature is more trouble than she bargained for.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The townsfolk draw inspiration form Rev Alden's principles and try not to rise to the Galinder brothers' troublemaking.

programme.title: A Hobo's Christmas
programme.desc: A dishevelled down-and-out who returns home to visit the family he deserted many years before, but his shunned son is not pleased by his sudden reappearance. Drama, starring Gerald McRaney, Barnard Hughes, Wendy Crewson and William Hickey.

programme.title: Angel in the Family
programme.desc: A widower reaches out to his estranged daughters after suffering a stroke and asks them to spend Christmas with him. Despite their misgivings, the warring sisters return home to be with him and experience a miracle when their late mother returns to life. Fantasy, starring Meredith Baxter, Tracey Needham, Natasha Gregson Wagner and Ronny Cox.

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia.

programme.title: Jonathan Stone: Threat of Innocence
programme.desc: An ex-cop recovering from the death of his wife is accused of a murder he did not commit. He tries to prove his innocence by tracking down the real killer, enlisting the aid of a wealthy socialite. Crime drama, starring Richard Crenna and Beverly D'Angelo.

programme.title: A Wind at My Back Christmas
programme.desc: Family members struggling to survive in Depression-era Ontario have their lives touched by the impending war in Europe when an unexpected visitor arrives. This seasonal drama is a spin-off from a hugely popular Canadian TV series, and stars Dylan Provencher, Tyrone Savage and James Carroll.

programme.title: Borrowed Hearts
programme.desc: A ruthless factory boss pays a hard-up employee to pose as his wife, hoping to impress a mysterious colleague - an arrangement with unexpected consequences for all concerned. Romantic drama, starring Roma Downey, Eric McCormack and Shawn Thompson.

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama. Shannen Doherty and Kevin Dillon star as parents searching for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, with Edward Asner, Dixie Carter and Michael Brandon.

programme.title: Prophet of Evil: The Ervil LeBaron Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, about religious fanatic Ervil LeBaron, who believed he had God's permission to kill anyone standing in the way of his drive for wealth and power. Starring Brian Dennehy, Tracy Needham and William Devane.

programme.title: Crown Heights
programme.desc: Two men living in a area surrounded by racial tension between the Jewish and Black communities try to bring their divided neighbourhood together through their passion for music in the aftermath of rioting. Fact-based drama set in 1991, starring Howie Mandel, Mario Van Peebles and Jeremy Blackman.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth falls for a new teacher, but is devastated to find he does not have long to live. Meanwhile, Ben worries about his new responsibilities as Cindy gives birth to a girl.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Josh gets caught breaking into Ike's store with Jeffrey, who manages to get away without being seen. Meanwhile, Ben decides to enlist after being humiliated by a soldier.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Charles is badly injured while walking in the woods with Laura, and only a blind man can save their lives. Guest starring Burl Ives.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles is badly injured while walking in the woods with Laura, and only a blind man can save their lives. Guest starring Burl Ives.(n)

programme.title: Ride to Freedom: The Rosa Parks Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the life of Rosa Parks, the black woman who famously refused to give up her seat on a bus to a white man in 1950s America. The action prompted a massive outpouring of anger and sparked the rise of the civil rights movement. Angela Bassett, Cicely Tyson and Peter Francis James star.(n)

programme.title: An Unexpected Love
programme.desc: A miserable suburban wife and mother decides to leave her humdrum existence behind her and rethink her life, and soon finds herself falling head-over-heels in love - with another woman. Drama, starring Leslie Hope, Wendy Crewson, DW Moffett and Alison Pill.(n)

programme.title: The Wipers Times
programme.desc: In the bombed-out ruins of the Belgian town of Ypres in 1916, Captain Fred Roberts and Lieutenant Jack Pearson discover a printing press and decide to start a satirical newspaper to raise the spirits of the British troops. It proves hugely popular with the men in the trenches - but their superior officers see it as an act of insubordination and subversion and call for a ban. Feature-length factual drama by Ian Hislop and Nick Newman, starring Ben Chaplin, Julian Rhind-Tutt, Michael Palin and Emilia Fox.(n)

programme.title: Crown Heights
programme.desc: Two men living in a area surrounded by racial tension between the Jewish and Black communities try to bring their divided neighbourhood together through their passion for music in the aftermath of rioting. Fact-based drama set in 1991, starring Howie Mandel, Mario Van Peebles and Jeremy Blackman.(n)

programme.title: A Silent Night
programme.desc: A mother and her son are caught in the middle of a Second World War battle and seek shelter in a cabin on Christmas Eve. During the night they are disturbed by three American soldiers and three Germans but she is determined they should keep the peace and enjoy a meal on the holy night. Drama, starring Linda Hamilton, Matthew Harbour and Alan Goulem.(n)

programme.title: Instant Message
programme.desc: Two pen pals who have written to each other since childhood finally get the chance to meet face to face. The only problem is that when they exchanged pictures, both sent a photo of their best friend instead. Confusion ensues as both correspondents try to coerce their friends into posing as them. Romantic comedy, starring Marla Sokoloff, Patrick J Adams and Lindy Booth.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Canaan
programme.desc: Two boys, one black and the other white, grow up in a racially divided Texas community in the 1960s. The pair take an instant dislike to each other, but their families are determined to end the conflict by forcing them to spend time together. The youngsters grow to become firm friends, but the tension among their neighbours is harder to resolve. Drama, with Jaishon Fisher and Zak Ludwig.(n)

programme.title: One Against the Wind
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War heroine Mary Lindell, who helped freedom fighters and members of the Allied forces escape the clutches of the Nazis in occupied France. Starring Judy Davis, Sam Neill, Denholm Elliot and Kate Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: I Am Slave
programme.desc: Wunmi Mosaku stars in the story of one woman's fight for freedom from modern-day slavery. Twelve-year-old Malia is snatched from her home in the Numa Mountains, Sudan, and spends the next six years of her life working for a Sudanese family. At the age of 18 she is sent to London, where she is stripped of her passport and subjected to brutality and inhumanity, until she calls on all her strength to plan an escape back to the father who never stopped searching for her. Drama inspired by real-life events, with Lubna Azabal and Igal Naor.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Seduction
programme.desc: A reporter poses as an illegal immigrant and takes a job in the office of a ruthless, seductive lawyer, hoping to expose her corrupt business practices. However, his pursuit of a story is threatened when he becomes infatuated with her. Comedy drama, starring Melanie Griffith and Esai Morales.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: A Song for Jason - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan and Mark help out at a camp for children with cancer, where they meet an angry teenage athlete and an overprotective mother. Giovanni Ribisi guest stars.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: A Song for Jason - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jonathan tries to persuade Jason's father to spend more time with his son, but finds he would rather forget the boy exists. Guest starring Giovanni Ribisi.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.sub-title: The Guns of Cibola Blanca - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Confederate Civil War veterans become bank robbers, disguising themselves as Union soldiers to discredit their old enemies.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.sub-title: The Guns of Cibola Blanca - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. A search is organised for Doc when his stagecoach arrives without its passengers.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica and Tess help a detective who specialises in cases involving missing children, but is haunted by past failures.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica's insistence that she is an angel results in her being placed in a mental institution for psychic evaluation.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John manages to upset Grandpa, who decides to pack his clothes and leave home, with Grandma in tow.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia helps a friend's daughter arrange her wedding, but the groom has one or two reservations concerning their plans.

programme.title: Wicked Love
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman found in a car boot after an attempt on her life that leaves her in a coma. As her unfaithful husband and his mistress stand trial, a controversy erupts over whether her life support should be switched off. Starring Rebecca Gibney, Vince Colosimo and Maya Stange.

programme.title: Visions of Terror
programme.desc: A police psychologist begins counselling a traumatised cop whose partner died in the line of duty, and soon realises there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Barbara Eden, Ted Marcoux and David Marciano.

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth is not happy when Grandma is visited by an old flame, while Jim-Bob persuades Yancy to use his talents to make fuel instead of moonshine.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: After moving his family from Wisconsin's `big woods' to Minnesota's prairie, pioneer Charles Ingalls settles on farmland by Plum Creek. He takes several jobs in a bid to acquire the deeds to his farm, but the multiple duties combined with stress take their toll. Drama, starring Martin Landau.

programme.title: DC 9/11: Time of Crisis
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, as people across America attempted to come to terms with the tragedy, focusing on the reaction of President George W Bush and the advice given by his many advisors. Timothy Bottoms, John Cunningham, Andrew Gillies, Penny Johnson and Doug Lennox star.

programme.title: William, Kate and George: The New Royal Family
programme.desc: With insightful expert commentary and exclusive footage, the documentary explores the development of a modern royal family in touch and relevant to its nation and people.

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.

programme.title: A Change of Heart
programme.desc: A happily married woman learns the hard way that her husband has been hiding a dark secret from her - by unexpectedly walking in on him and his lover, another man. Drama, starring Jean Smart, John Terry and Dorian Harewood.

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark asks God to make Jonathan a police officer. After 40 years, Jonathan becomes human, only to realise the harsh realities of being a cop and receive him an insight into Mark's more cynical outlook on life.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: An aspiring actress just wants to be herself, but her controlling father is determined to maintain control over her public image.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Two drovers find they are unable to compete with the railroad and are forced to turn to crime.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A farmer insists his three sons get married, so they kidnap a trio of saloon girls to be their brides. Guest starring Harry Morgan (MASH) and William Katt (Carrie).(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica visits a woman racked with guilt after putting her mentally ill son into a home. Roma Downey stars.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica helps a concentration camp survivor overcome the bitterness of losing his family in the Holocaust. Drama, starring Roma Downey and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason looks to develop his musical skills further by applying to win a scholarship for the Klineberg Conservatory.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa wins a raffle, but Grandma is upset to learn that his prize is a statue which reminds him of one of his ex-girlfriends.(n)

programme.title: Other Women's Children
programme.desc: A doctor's relationship with a terminally ill child adds pressure to her already rocky marriage as she spends more time with her patient and gradually neglects her home life. Fact-based drama, starring Melanie Mayron, Eric Pospisil and Geraint Wyn Davies.(n)

programme.title: In the Best Interest of the Children
programme.desc: A manic depressive woman is released from an institution and tries to regain custody of her five children. However, their foster parents wish to officially adopt them, and her eldest daughter believes that would be for the best. As a bitter legal battle ensues, the mother's mental health begins to deteriorate once more. Fact-based drama, starring Sarah Jessica Parker and Sally Struthers.(n)

programme.title: To Save the Children
programme.desc: Members of a close-knit community are stunned when the pressures of life prove too much for a former police officer, prompting him to snap in violent fashion, building a bomb and holding pupils at a local school hostage. Drama, starring Richard Thomas, Robert Urich and Wendy Crewson.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The townsfolk is stunned by news of the attack on Pearl Harbor. Mary Ellen receives word that her husband is assumed to have been killed.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: After moving his family from Wisconsin's `big woods' to Minnesota's prairie, pioneer Charles Ingalls settles on farmland by Plum Creek. He takes several jobs in a bid to acquire the deeds to his farm, but the multiple duties combined with stress take their toll. Drama, starring Martin Landau.(n)

programme.title: Thicker Than Blood
programme.desc: A man's agonising courtroom battle to gain custody of his son is dealt a crippling blow by the discovery that he isn't the youngster's real father after all. Drama, starring Peter Strauss and Rachel Ticotin.(n)

programme.title: Stolen Babies
programme.desc: A welfare worker attempts to bring down a woman she believes is running an illegal adoption racket, but finds her efforts constantly thwarted by her adversary's society connections. Fact-based drama, starring Lea Thompson and Mary Tyler Moore.(n)

programme.title: Due East
programme.desc: An award-winning scholar cares for her widower father and keeps very much to herself, but when she meets a loner she finally begins to feel a sense of belonging - only for a tragic series of events to leave her facing an uphill struggle. Drama, starring Clara Bryant, Kate Capshaw, Robert Forster and Cybill Shepherd.(n)

programme.title: No One Would Tell
programme.desc: A shy teenager thinks all her dreams have come true when the school's star athlete asks her out. However, the relationship soon turns sour as her seemingly perfect boyfriend becomes possessive, controlling and violent. Drama, starring Fred Savage, Candace Cameron Bure, Gregory Alan Williams and Rodney Eastman.(n)

programme.title: Carpet Season
programme.desc: Bill, Reg and Phil set off on a quest to retrieve Christopher's stolen iPad. Meanwhile, a famously idiosyncratic rock photographer arrives to shoot the band, causing chaos backstage

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: After a public declaration from Marisol, Hector's rematch with Whittaker is cancelled. However, Ray enlists the help of Lena and Daryll to ensure the match proceeds. Meanwhile, an angry neighbor confronts the Donovans about Conor's reckless behavior. And Teresa's worsening depression causes her family to have her committed to a mental hospital

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: When a giant meteor is set to strike earth, humanity's only hope is a weapons' engineer but when he's kidnapped by a cult leader who is hoping for the world's demise, a convicted killer and a special agent must join forces to rescue him. Stars Ice-T

programme.title: The Hand That Rocks The Cradle
programme.desc: A live-in nanny (Rebecca De Mornay) with a frightening hidden agenda becomes trouble for her employers (Annabella Sciorra and Matt McCoy) when a seething vendetta explodes into homicidal rage in this well-crafted thriller, a box office smash

programme.title: Things You Can Tell Just By Looking At Her
programme.desc: Glenn Close, Holly Hunter, Cameron Diaz, Calista Flockhart, Kathy Baker and Amy Brenneman star in Rodrigo Garcia's debut feature, composed of five narratives which examine the hidden emotional lives of women in contemporary Los Angeles. An unmarried bank manager faces the possibility of an abortion; a police detective discovers her blind sister's astute insight; a lonely gynecologist consults a psychic; a lesbian couple confronts the finality of their relationship; and a single mother becomes erotically intrigued by a dwarf next door

programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for(n)

Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar(n)

programme.desc: A newspaper cartoonist becomes obsessed with solving San Francisco's infamous "Zodiac" serial killer case, and eventually closes in on a suspect after the case has long become cold in this fact-based thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr. and Chloe Sevigny(n)

Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: It Follows

As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez

programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power(n)

programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status(n)

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends(n)

programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.desc: A madcap dramatic comedy about a self-induced attention-deficit disordered, learning disabled, Tourette's syndrome suffering, balance impaired, ex-alcoholic young man from the Upper East Side of Manhattan and the woman who inspires him to try to get it together

programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.title: Jonah Hill / Alan Arkin
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jonah Hill and Alan Arkin(c)

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: In this spoof of the 'Taken' action-film franchise, an ex-CIA agent is now working as a mall security guard who keeps finding his things are being taken from him, including his wife, his dog and his daughter's virginity. With the help of his elderly mother, he must battle his nemesis to free his family. Stars Margaret Cho

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Five teens journey into a mysterious forest for an evening of flashlight games and ghost stories but their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence that seizes upon their deepest fears

William Fichtner, Joss Ackland, Peter Riegert and Stellan Skarsgard costar in this moving, memorable film from French director Alain Berliner ("Ma Vie en Rose")

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack(n)

Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Hostel: Part II
programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection

programme.title: Mr. Holland's Opus
programme.desc: Richard Dreyfuss stars in this sentimental favorite as an aspiring composer who settles uncomfortably into a 30-year career as a high school music teacher, struggling to achieve his dreams while raising a deaf son and only slowly realizing the impact he has had on generations of students. Glenne Headly and Olympia Dukakis costar in this heartwarming drama

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: In this psychological action-thriller, an elite group of the FBI's most talented young agents, skilled in reading the minds of elusive serial killers, is being intensively trained on a remote island. But they soon learn that there is a killer among them and they must find a way to get out alive. Stars Christian Slater and Val Kilmer

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino reinvigorated the noir crime drama with this wildly entertaining blockbuster that casts John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson as hit-man partners whose meandering paths cross those of a powerful gangster (Ving Rhames), the latter's overdosing girlfriend (Uma Thurman), a desperate boxer (Bruce Willis) and a pair of stickup artists named Honeybunny (Amanda Plummer) and Pumpkin (Tim Roth). "Leaves viewers both exhilarated and exhausted - hearts racing and knuckles white from the ride." -Amazon.com(n)

Also stars Kerry Washington(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: A group of gay activists work to support the miners of a tiny Welsh village during their lengthy strike in the summer of 1984. Inspired by an extraordinary true story(n)

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda(n)

programme.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars as an oceanographer out to exact revenge on a mythical shark by rallying a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist and a man who may or may not be his son in this Wes Anderson comedy. Also stars Owen Wilson, Cate Blanchett, Anjelica Huston and Willem Dafoe(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation(n)

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study

programme.desc: Racing against time, a man must help his family escape their home that has been turned into a time bomb by a phone caller who demands they play his game(n)

programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.desc: Two teenage girls are outed at high school for being gay and are faced with difficult choices about their friendship, their sexual identity and themselves in this short film directed by Seith Mann and written by Janaya Greene

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: An urban fairy tale set in Manchester about a young boy whose tragic life takes an unexpected turn one Christmas Eve after he meets a mysterious stranger, who takes him on a journey of discovery that will change his destiny. Stars Eddie Izzard

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming

programme.desc: Tim Allen narrates this triumphant, comic, coming-of-age tale about Rex, a penguin with a love of epic voyages and adventure who arrives home to his Antarctic birthplace to search for the perfect mate among the city's six million inhabitants

This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

Stars Pablo Schreiber(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

A disgraced Harry faked his death after the Qasim escaped and Will was brought back into the MI-5 fold to locate Harry and return him to headquarters. Harry convinces Will that there is a traitor in MI-5 and they must work together to prevent a terrorist attack on the city of London. In the pages of the PennySaver, she finds childless couple Vanessa and Mark Loring who look like the ideal couple. But, as the months progress and her stomach swells, Juno begins to doubt both them and her course of action. programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck meat salesmen struggling to make a buck find that sometimes you have to grill your clients to secure the sale in this rib-tickling comedy that teams King of Queens star Kevin James with Everybody Loves Raymond star Ray Romano. Maurice (Romano) and Dave (James) have been issued an ultimatum by their frustrated boss: move some meat or hit the street. Now forced to make the sale of a lifetime or face a grim fate working behind the counter of the local butcher, the two hapless meat-slingers set their sights on a foolproof prospect that promises to provide just the funds needed to keep them afloat. Unfortunately for Maurice and Dave, their perfect plan leads them into the company of some very bad men, and now with their jobs on the line and their lives hanging in the balance, these two scheming salesmen must finalize the big deal and get the money back to the boss before they end up in the freezer with the rest of the dead meat

programme.title: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: A man trying to help out his sister finds himself chin-deep in hot water in this screwball comedy. Yuppie businessman Bill Campbell (Matthew Broderick) is close to sealing a $140 million business deal when he gets a phone call from his little sister Marci (Courtney Peldon), who is convinced that her new stepfather, Peter Van Der Haven (Jeffrey Jones), the mayor of the city of Buzzsaw, California, is up to no good. Though understandably wary, Bill heads to Buzzsaw, where he promptly loses his paperwork on the deal in progress and is confronted by the city's remarkable collection of eccentrics, including the crazed fugitive Sally (Heidi Kling), the subnormal Jim Jr. and Jim Sr. (John C. Reilly and Michael Monks), and Ann (Marian Mercer), the mayor's loopy wife. It turns out that Marci wasn't entirely wrong; year's ago, Peter's diabolical twin brother Matt (also played by Jones) was sent to jail in his brother's place on criminal charges, and now Matt has violent revenge on his mind. Out on a Limb features an original score by noted composer and arranger Van Dyke Parks

programme.title: Soapdish
programme.desc: Sally Field and Kevin Kline star in this tale of backstabbing and deceit on an American daytime soap

programme.desc: Felicity Huffman gives an Oscar-nominated performance as a man on the verge of having a sex-change operation who discovers that he has a 17-year-old son

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis

programme.desc: An A-list actor and his posse of best buds navigate the perils and pleasures of Hollywood life

programme.title: The Great Waldo Pepper

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin inherited his Chicago barbershop from his dad, but now he's sold it to loanshark Lester. Hearing that the crook plans to turn it into a nightclub, Calvin resolves to get his salon back. Comedy

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
