A hot young cast including Adam Garcia, Amy Adams, James Van Der Beek and Mena Suvari stars in this comedy-drama. Colin Hanks, Xander Berkeley. Directed by Matthew Cole Weis(n)

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: Fast-paced farce about an unlikely pair who go to extreme lengths to have a child. When an incompetent robber marries a prison officer, they discover that they are infertile. In order to appease his wife's longings for a child, the man steals one of a set of quintuplets, but mayhem ensues when the child's rich father sends a rabbit-shooting bounty hunter after the kidnapper(n)

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Two fighters who never made it to the championships receive one final chance at glory in this boxing road movie. But their purse requires them to be ready to rumble in Vegas in less than five hours(n)

programme.title: Saving Grace
programme.desc: Two-time Oscar nominee Brenda Blethyn ("Secrets & Lies") is a delight as a respectable Englishwoman who's plunged into debt after the death of her irresponsible husband. To raise money, she and her gardener cultivate a real cash crop---marijuana. It's a joint venture that just might save her country estate. Craig Ferguson, Martin Clunes(n)

programme.title: Club Paradise
programme.desc: In this comedy, Jack Moniker (Robin Williams) and Ernest Reed (Jimmy Cliff) become partners in a deal to modernize a run-down Caribbean resort and turn it into a swank attraction for the rich and playful. Jack leaves behind his life as a fireman and Ernest hops to convert his talents as a reggae singer into administrative prowess. Multiple sketches involve a range of quirky and complaining guests at the resort, and exactly how their complaints are handled. In the meantime, the corrupt prime minister of the island (Adolph Caesar) plans to sell the lot to an international corporation(n)

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: When ordinary fish tank cleaner Deuce Bigalow (Rob Schneider) accidentally sets fire to a kitchen whilst house-sitting, he must go into business as a male prostitute to pay for the damage(n)

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: In this razor-sharp comedy, Queen Latifah is a shear delight as she reprises her "Barbershop 2: Back in Business" role as sassy hairstylist Gina Norris. Gina has relocated to Atlanta and has opened her own salon, which houses a zany staff and welcomes a wacky assortment of clients. Djimon Hounsou generates romantic sparks as an electrician hoping to become the new man in Gina's life. Alfre Woodard, Alicia Silverstone, Kevin Bacon, Keshia Knight Pulliam, Andie MacDowell, Della Reese, Paige Hurd(n)

programme.desc: Mel Brooks for some reason decided to wait a decade before spoofing Star Wars and its ilk, and ten years was certainly too long to wait for this relatively weak offering from the comedy director. That said, there are a fair few laughs, mostly from Rick Moranis as Vader clone Dark Helmet and the late John Candy as the reliable space dog, Barf(n)

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The biggest babies in the entertainment business take their act to Europe in this sequel to the surprise-hit animated feature The Rugrats Movie. Chuckie (voice of Christine Cavanaugh) has been fretting over his father Chas (voice of Michael Bell) and his status as a single father, as he wants to have a mommy like all of his friends. Chas and his father Stu (voice of Jack Riley) were hired to create a bevy of electronic critters for the newly opened Euro-Reptarland theme park, but the robots are acting up, and park manager Coco La Bouche (Susan Sarandon) is hopping mad. So Stu and Chas are flown to Paris to do some repairs, with Chas bringing Chuckie and all his friends along. Their visit to the City of Lights proves to be one adventure after another, as Chuckie tries to find a suitable mother (with Coco leading the pack) and Tommy (voice of Elizabeth Dailey) somehow gets behind the wheel of the giant Reptar robot. Rugrats in Paris: The Movie features original songs from T-Boz from TLC, The Baha Men, and Mylene Farmer, while John Lithgow, Debbie Reynolds, and Mako contribute to the voice cast

programme.desc: A young boy discovers a huge metal robot in the forest near his home and saves the creature from electrocution. The two strike up an unlikely friendship, until a suspicious FBI agent learns of the giant's existence

programme.desc: The Twelve Dancing Princesses. The animated Happily Ever After Fairy Tales series uses people of color as the characters in classic fairy tales, thereby including many children who might feel left out by most retellings. In this story, a king offers a crown to the man who can tell him how his beautiful daughters escape every night, thereby ruining their dancing shoes. programme.desc: Hilarious follow up to Friday. Now it's Next Friday and Craig is still living with his parents in South Central Los Angeles while looking for a job and remembering his moment of glory four years earlier, when he finally beat local bully, Debo . But now Debo has escaped from prison and is looking to exact revenge on Craig. Craig's dad takes him to Rancho Cucamonga to hide out with his Uncle Elroy and cousin Day-Day, who have moved to the suburbs after winning the lottery. But once he gets there, Craig and his cousin have a string of suburban adventures that make his South Central experiences look tame

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Bret Gives Up the Dream. Murray tells the boys to get a job because the band has no money. But when Bret's sign-holding career gets in the way of the band, Murray fires him. Jemaine has to continue with a tape recorder. Features the songs Inner City Pressure and She's So Hot...Boom!

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Kung fu fighter Huo Jaunjia learns to fight honourably with the help of blind beauty Moon. Wushu action based on the life of a martial arts legend

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: Adapted from the young adult novel by John Green, Fox 2000's Paper Towns tells the story of the bizarre mystery that unfolds in the wake of an acute youthful trauma. After stumbling across the body of a suicide victim, two young neighbors gradually begin to drift apart. Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage

programme.title: Other People's Money
programme.desc: Corporate raider Larry 'The Liquidator' Garfield sees easy pickings in the cable company of stolid old Andrew Jorgenson. But the veteran and his wife won't go down without a fight, particularly with help from his lawyer daughter Kate. Will Larry's lust overcome his greed?

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Romantic comedy from the makers of Notting Hill. Peter Colt is a low-ranking tennis star whose misfortune on the court is only matched by his extremely bad luck in love. His life is transformed, however, when he is chosen as a wildcard to play at Wimbledon and, while there, meets and falls in love with a young American on the women's circuit. Their love match spurs him on to reach the tournament final, but will his good fortune hold out long enough for him to lift the prestigious trophy?

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Action thriller in which an FBI agent agrees to have the face of a captured international terrorist grafted onto his own head in order to discover the location of an enormous bomb. The plan goes awry when the terrorist, now having assumed the agent's face, escapes and destroys all evidence of the switch. A deadly cat-and-mouse game ensues

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: Adapted from the young adult novel by John Green, Fox 2000's Paper Towns tells the story of the bizarre mystery that unfolds in the wake of an acute youthful trauma. After stumbling across the body of a suicide victim, two young neighbors gradually begin to drift apart. Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him

programme.title: J. Cole Forest Hills Drive: Homecoming
programme.desc: A profile of rapper J. Cole features a tour of Fayetteville, N.C., the town where he grew up, and concert performances of the songs on his third studio album, "2014 Forest Hills Drive," including "Apparently," "G.O.M.D." and "Wet Dreamz."(n)

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: The directors of Scary, Date and Epic Movie get their mickey-taking mitts on Frank Miller's 300. Cue merciless mockery Spartan-style(n)

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: This exciting chase-film originally aired on television and tells the true tale of the high-speed pursuit of a fleeing bank robber by a determined Denver policeman, and of the courageous local television news crew who captured it all on film and managed to play a big part in bringing the crook to justice(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Jurassic World'
programme.desc: A look at "Jurassic World" (2015), the fourth installment in the "Jurassic Park" series that unfolds 22 years after the 1993 original and features a new dinosaur theme park on Isla Nubar. The film stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio, and is directed by Colin Trevorrow(n)

programme.title: Nighthawks
programme.desc: Fresh from mounting a devastating bomb attack in London, an international terrorist arrives in New York and remains intent upon wreaking further bloody havoc. His preparation is clinical and thorough but he overlooks one thing - the grit and steely determination of one New York cop(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: A playboy husband plots to kill his heiress wife, believing that she's going to run off with her lover and leave him penniless(n)

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: Aspiring EDM musician Cole works to hone his craft, and is taken under the wing of a jaded, successful DJ named James. However, the friendship between the two men sours when Cole begins to fall for James' beautiful girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Van Helsing

Together with a beautiful ally descended from a powerful royal family, his goal of annihilating the enemy brings him face to face with his own past when he unearths a revelational secret(n)

programme.title: 25th Hour

programme.title: San Andreas

programme.title: Frailty

programme.title: Slither
programme.desc: James Gunn's directorial debut is an enjoyable horror movie, fusing the splatter and monster sub-genres, which begins when a courting couple, seeking privacy in the woods near small town Wheelsy, come across a just-landed meteorite. In no time at all, he's transformed into a toothy squid-like killing creature, while she becomes the breeder of deadly bloodthirsty slugs. Dry-witted police chief Bill Pardy is soon on the case but his problems are compounded when the victims of the slugs start coming back to life as slaves of the aliens(n)

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: Aspiring EDM musician Cole works to hone his craft, and is taken under the wing of a jaded, successful DJ named James. However, the friendship between the two men sours when Cole begins to fall for James' beautiful girlfriend(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: An employee of a one-hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a young suburban family

programme.title: According to Spencer
programme.desc: Jesse Bradford and Mia Kirshner star in this cheerful comedy about chance meetings. Spencer (Bradford) gets a job as a clerk at an ad agency, then is delighted to learn that an old crush (Kirshner) works there as well. One question remains: Will she find him as irresistable? David Krumholtz, Brad Rowe, Florence Stanley, Marissa Ribisi

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Action packed thriller starring Robert De Niro and Edward Norton. A professional criminal decides to leave the business for good until a young thief makes him an offer he can't refuse

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: In Terry Gilliam's inventive fantasy, the famed authors are cast as con artists who get caught up in a real-life fairy tale involving a haunted forest where girls have been disappearing. Matt Damon and Heath Ledger star in this whimsical adventure. Jonathan Pryce, Monica Bellucci, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey

programme.title: Summer Catch
programme.desc: Baseball could be the only ticket to success for hard-working Ryan. He wins a spot on the local team, but is caught between his off-field romance with holidaying Tenley and his sporting ambitions. Romcom with a good supporting cast

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Based on the true story of how Charlie Wilson, an alcoholic womaniser and Texas congressman, persuaded the CIA to train and arm resistance fighters in Afghanistan to fend off the Soviet Union. With the help of rogue CIA agent, Gust Avrakotos, the two men supplied money, training and a team of military experts that turned the ill-equipped Afghan freedom-fighters into a force that brought the Red Army to a stalemate and set the stage for conflicts in the Middle East that still rage to this day

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Four Oscars, including Best Picture and Best Director, went to Ron Howard's engrossing drama about John Nash, the volatile Nobel Prize-winning mathematician

programme.title: Deception
programme.desc: A disconnected accountant finds his mundane life injected with a new sense of urgency after striking up a friendship with a charismatic attorney in director Marcel Langenegger's sexually charged action thriller. Jonathan (Ewan McGregor) is an accountant who has lost his passion in life. When his powerful new lawyer friend, Wyatt (Hugh Jackman), introduces Jonathan to a salacious underground sex club called The List, the dejected accountant soon believes he has found the woman of his dreams (Michelle Williams). His newfound happiness takes a turn for the worse, however, when Jonathan is named the prime suspect in the woman's disappearance as well as the theft of 20 million dollars

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalise Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: The early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career, from the late 1920s to the mid-1940s. His career spanned everything from oil, for which he cared little, to movies, casinos, and aviation - as he turned millions of dollars into billions

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Based on the true story of how Charlie Wilson, an alcoholic womaniser and Texas congressman, persuaded the CIA to train and arm resistance fighters in Afghanistan to fend off the Soviet Union. With the help of rogue CIA agent, Gust Avrakotos, the two men supplied money, training and a team of military experts that turned the ill-equipped Afghan freedom-fighters into a force that brought the Red Army to a stalemate and set the stage for conflicts in the Middle East that still rage to this day

programme.title: Mapplethorpe: Look at the Pictures

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. But once in court, Crawford, representing himself, starts to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him... Can he possibly get away with his crime? Also starring Rosamund Pike, Billy Burke and Fiona Shaw

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: A collection of interweaving stories all based in the corrupt, crime infested hell-hole that is Basin City. programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.desc: Double bill. The team works out how to slow down time so the summer days will last longer, and Thera and Chet swap personalities.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Monster Dump/So You Think You Can Stank.
programme.desc: Double bill. Disaster strikes during a field trip to the town volcano and the Ninja must save his classmates. Then, Randy and Howard are judges at the school talent show and cause a mass stanking.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. Sylvia gets Wander to act like a bad guy to fit in on an asteroid full of outlaws. Then, Wander and Sylvia meet goat-like warrior people plagued by a troll and help get rid of it.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Billy gives Spencer a mystical hat that promises to give limitless confidence to the wearer. Then, Billy tries out Principal Ponzi's experimental hair-growing machine.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Trying to help Spencer get an authentic-sounding scream to use in one of his movies, Billy scares Mallory so badly that she decides to move far away. Then, Spencer wants to buy a piece of horror movie memorabilia, but does not have any money.

programme.title: The Let's Go Club
programme.sub-title: A Clubhouse Trip Around the World!.
programme.desc: This week the clubhouse is packed full of things from around the world! Let's Goer's, Max and Lucas, tell us all about their brilliant ballet dancing! Martin and Craig have a colourful, and crunchy, Tabletop Activity - rainbow salad in a jar! And we'll be exploring the globe in an animated fact-finding mission! There are lots more Send-ins from CBeebies viewers, telling the clubhouse crew everything they've been up to. Speedy Let's Goer Alexander joins Joanna outside the clubhouse in his cool go-kart! And Avril is putting on a tasty world food party with her friends! Plus everyone's favourite singing and dancing with the ever-so-catchy Get Set, Let's Go! song, and the boogie-brilliant Club Dance.(n)
